file_content.text: Work = incomplete // Contacts = waiting // T7 = back on mission!
This is the Old World as most Zakuulans know it--a place to mingle with the rabble and then go home to brag about it. One big party.
I have a contact nearby. Need to go alone.
Does this mean you're back to "ruthless enforcer Senya"?
On the job now?
Yes.
Don't keep me waiting.
Be quick.
I'm coming with you.
Alone? Nope.
Informants and strangers don't mix.
Won't be long.
I had always intended to visit the Old World. I thought I would have the time. Delightful.
You couldn't have mentioned Senya was the mother of your children?
I wanted to see what she would do. In the end, she chose to place her trust in you and your associates.
She'll make a powerful ally.
Glad she did.
Intelligent, skilled, confident... and fearless. She does not give in.
That wasn't an act of trust. As far as she knew, Heskal would have said something.
Out of necessity, not trust.
Cynical. If that's what you choose to believe, I cannot stop you.
You claim you want to help, but you're still playing the same old head games.
You're manipulative.
I granted her the freedom to make her own decision, just as I have with you.
I just hope you'll honor our arrangement better than the one you had with her.
Just remember our arrangement.
If you can read me, I made some new friends. Could use a hand.
I'm on my way.
Priority call for High Justice Vaylin. She'll want to know who I just spotted....
You have offered me choices... at times. But I didn't ask you to be here in the first place.
Not exactly.
If that were true, you'd leave my mind. Now.
That's a lie.
Contact = highly informative // Valuable data feed location = identified // You + T7 = almost done!
Mission = complete // T7 = moving on to secondary objectives // You + T7 = great team!
T7 = detects contact nearby // Contact = droid // T7 = sorry + will return shortly
T7 = tapping Old World surveillance feeds // Mission = dangerous // You + T7 = guaranteed success!
T7 = beginning next mission // You + T7 = meet on Gravestone later // You + Senya = good luck!
